name: Rodelbahn Brindlingalm
description:
Lenght: 2,5 km 
Altitude at start: 1823 m
Altitude at destination: 1480 m
Altitude difference: 343 m 
Difficulty level: easy
Opening times: open every day with sufficient snow 
Lighting: No
Sled hire: No
Cost of using the sled run: free of charge
Available refreshment points: the Gasthof Mösl and at the start of the sled run at the Brindlingalm
Special features: It is possible to stay overnight at the Brindlingalm 
Accessibility:
   How to find: Ascent to the Gasthof Mösl via the Zillertaler Höhenstraße. Parking available at the Gasthof Mösl 
Ascent: The start of the sled run is only accessible on foot, time of walk from the Gasthof Mösl: approx. 60 min. 
help with your ascent: none
